message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe will be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit high for me. Would you consider $10,500?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $10,500 is too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $12,250?
I understand you're looking for a price closer to your initial offer, Alice. While $12,250 is still a bit high for me, I'm willing to increase my offer to $11,000.
